forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. North northwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this evening, the air is crisp and the sky remains mostly clear, offering a tranquil view of the cityscape as the sun slowly retreats beneath the horizon. A gentle north-northwest breeze stirs the atmosphere, whispering hints of the cool night, inviting one to wrap up warmly in a cozy sweater or light jacket as temperatures dabble around the low 40s. The forecast for tomorrow unfolds with the promise of a sunny day, where the sun will cast its glow across the golden hues of the city as it hovers near a mild 62 degrees.  

Though the marine layer is playing coy, it’s receded for now, leaving a pleasant clarity to the evening sky that tempts one to stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps with a warm drink in hand, as the lights of the city begin to twinkle against the fading day. As the night progresses, drawing closer to your home or a quiet café might be in order, allowing for an evening of reflection or a good book, all while the gentle rhythm of urban life continues to hum softly in the background.
